content.rendered:
We are happy to announce our tutorial, From an application to a fully integrated workflow – Comprehensive software engineering with SeqAn, in a full day tutorial at the ECCB 2018 in Athen.

This is a beginner tutorial and focuses on basic tool programming using C++ and the SeqAn library. In addition participants will learn how SeqAn and external  tools can be integrated into the Workflowsystem KNIME to build up comprehensive workflows connected to the strong capabilities of data mining included in KNIME.

You can find more information regarding the tutorial at the ECCB.

Please register for tutorial t9 directly at the ECCB 2018: http://eccb18.org/registration/

Please don’t hesitate writing us if you have more questions.

We are looking forward meeting you there.

p.s. If you can’t make it to ECCB 2018, we will present the brand new SeqAn 3 design at the GCB 2018, and we will have our own User Meeting from September 19th – 21st, with a lot of show cases, programming and KNIME tutorials, and many great news for our users, regarding performance and efficiency. More information to our User Meeting will follow soon.
